## FetchStateSummary.peers\_on\_backoff property

The peer URL for nodes that are currently on backoff because of failed fetch requests, and the timestamp when that backoff will expire.

If peers are in here then they are not being used as potential sources in \[`FetchStateSummary::pending_requests`<!-- -->\].

**Signature:**

```typescript
peers_on_backoff: Map<string, number>;
```
